did.head: DESCRIPTIVE SUMMARY
did.unittitle: Mariposa Education and Research Foundation records, 1970-1987.
did.physdesc: Printed materials, office files, publications, 8mm film reels, audio reels, cassette tapes, photographs.
did.repository: Division of Rare and Manuscript Collections, Cornell University Library
did.abstract: Mariposa's organizational records, plus some of the ephemera and audio-visual materials it collected.

bioghist.head: ORGANIZATIONAL HISTORY
bioghist.p: The Mariposa Education and Research Foundation was founded to educate the public and its leaders about human sexuality and to bridge the gap between the accurate information known to researchers and the sexual beliefs held by most other Americans. For its libraries, it collected periodicals and other publications, personal files, legal documents, notes, manuscripts, clippings, and films pertaining to all aspects of human sexuality, and to the gay and lesbian experience in particular.

scopecontent.head: COLLECTION DESCRIPTION
scopecontent.p: Mariposa's organizational records, including mailings and minutes of meetings. Also educational materials Mariposa created for the public, including posters and brochures, plus some of the ephemera (for example magazines and photographs) and audio-visual materials it collected. Themes include birth control, gay and lesbian rights and legal issues, S/M lifestyle, and other aspects of human sexuality.

prefercite.head: Cite As:
prefercite.p: Mariposa Education and Research Foundation records, #7300. Division of Rare and Manuscript Collections, Cornell University Library.

relatedmaterial.head: RELATED MATERIALS
relatedmaterial.p: Distinct sub-collections are cataloged separately. For a list of these component collections, search the Library catalog under the title Mariposa Education and Research Foundation records.

did.unittitle: Lesbian and Gay History Group of Toronto

scopecontent.p: Two film reels: Close Feelings and Hope Is Not A Method; Audiocassettes: "Sol Gordon, 10/19/1973, Owego", "Getting Together is Life Itself", Blur "Girls & Boys" single; Mini educational films on birth control.

Journal of Sex Education & Therapy, The Personnel and Guidance Journal, miscellaneous professional health magazines: The Female Patient, The International Journal of Psycho-Analysis, Society for Sex Therapy and Research Directory, etc.; miscellaneous mainstream magazines with GLBT related articles: Time, New York, Inquiry Magazine, etc. Most magazines from the 1970s and 80s.
Miscellaneous physique photos and other nude photos, including 7 Colt Studio black and white photographs.

did.unittitle: "What Has Jimmy Carter Done for Gays?", New York State Democratic Party
"Drinking Patterns in Homosexual and Heterosexual Women", Lewis
National Gay Archives and Library, Philadelphia, Barbara Gittings
Correspondence regarding sexual and gender identity disorders in DSM III
Mailings, flyers, brochures from gay/lesbian events, issues from Vermont to California
Washington State Network of Sexual Minorities
San Diego Lesbian and Gay Community Center

scopecontent.p: Santa Barbara Gay and Lesbian Unity Week, May 23-31, featuring Bruce Voeller and The Mariposa Portraits; Homosexuality: the Last Debate, featuring Bruce Voeller; Grace Jones, New Years Eve 1983
Miscellaneous adult movies, 8mm film reels; Miscellaneous unlabeled audio rells, also audio reels labeled: Callahan Research Group Session, 5/8/73 and 5/21/73, Callahan Research News Session, 5/22/73

Newsletters, club information, brochures, etc. Info. from TAIL (Total Ass Involvement League), FFA (Fall Festival Association aka Fist Fuckers of America), info. on fisting, An Exploratory Descriptive Study of a Self-Defined S/M Sample; also miscellaneous mailings to Bruce Voeller: Information from SAGE, MECLA, misc. democratic clubs; newspaper clippings.

note.p: Includes handwritten notes on plays about gay men, and on gay men's reactions to various plays
